name: RPG 3D
description:
The first and only specialized shooting game with RPG in the world.
The game with beautiful surroundings 3D, 3D sounds in the environment with the explosion of rockets and rocket launchers can be combat.

Do you know that every RPG men in the world that the war could destroy 10 targets with rockets if alive, at least one bullet hit his body.

Vtvphay self-propelled armored like tanks and armored personnel carriers as well as anti-personnel and anti-bunker weapons used.
However you with RPG battle enemies in the concrete bunkers, watch towers and vehicles equipped with cannons on the high you go.

The game is very high and no matter how you get stronger and stronger enemies to battle come equipped with.

This is a war and RPG men in a trench or hole bunker does not have the courage to face with the enemy firing rockets to aim and shoot on goal Qql.


Your continued participation in the war depends on your skills and conflict management in a timely manner is dangerous purpose.


Features:

- FPS real (First Person Shooter)
- Lurking enemy forces in spectacular fashion
- The real enemy forces on the ground in the trenches long and vehicles equipped with
- Weapons with appropriate control
- Excellent environment
- Amazing sound effects
- Easy user interface

How to play:

- Touch and drag anywhere on the screen, to target-oriented RPG and get fit
- The fire button on the left click to shoot
- RPG you powerful, professional racket is unlimited
- Your help is fast and ready to fight
